title: In Season 3 of ‘Succession,’ Jeremy Strong Lets Kendall Roy Off the Leash
sub_head: The HBO drama is back, picking up the saga of billionaire Logan Roy and the blood sport for control of Waystar Royco
body:
Kendall Roy is holed up in a bathroom. Lying fully clothed in an empty bathtub, having chucked his family’s media empire into a buzz saw on live TV.
Then, in the newest installment of the HBO drama “Succession,” Kendall strides out of the bathroom like a different person. “OK,” he says, “action stations!”
